entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chibougamau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:27 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -23.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chibougamau Chapais Airport 11:00 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

Pressure: 102.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 81 %

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 18.
